about_the_game:
Explore the laboratory complex, solve problems to move on, find secret documents and don't let the aliens catch you...

Meteor shower
A meteor shower that passes over the earth leads to the appearance of strange creatures. The meteorite impact sites were surveyed by employees of secret organizations and the fragments were taken to laboratories for study. Soon, workers leave one of these laboratories for unknown reasons.
You are a legendary journalist who goes to this laboratory to find out where these asteroids came from and who these creatures are.

Laboratory complex
A secret laboratory was built deep in the forest for the purpose of studying alien technology. All the UFO debris was taken there and captured aliens were also kept there.

Extraterrestrial technologies
Study alien technologies located in the complex, such as lasers, teleports, bombs, to clear the way for yourself. Solve puzzles caused by laboratory accidents and try to get to the bottom of the truth...

Aliens
There are aliens in the laboratory and they are not at all harmless. Be careful and avoid contact with them, it will end badly.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Manjaro
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel / Amd processor, 2 GHz

name: Aliens and Asteroids

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel / Amd processor, 2 GHz

short_description: The legendary journalist sets out to investigate an incident that occurred in a laboratory for the study of extraterrestrial technologies. But this trip is not complete without unexpected guests...
